text: The India-Pakistan War of 1947-48 is also known as the First Kashmir War. It was fought between the Dominion of India and Dominion of Pakistan over the former Princely state of Kashmir and Jammu from 1947 to 1948. The result of thewar still affects the geopolitics of both the countries. == Major battles == == References == Category:Wars involving Pakistan Category:1947 in Asia Category:Wars involving India Category:Jammu and Kashmir Category:1940s in India Category:1940s conflicts Category:20th century in Pakistan
title: First Kashmir War
